snippet.title: Deals: Scrub A Dub Dubstep With This 80% Off Shower Speaker
snippet.content:
Your bathroom might have some amazing acoustics, but the singing really should be left to the pros. Perfect for those shower-time jam sessions, the puts out twice the power of typical bathroom speakers, so you can actually hear your music over the running water.
Twice the size of your normal shower speaker, this device comes with an upgraded audio chipset, allowing it to produce up to three watts of sound while making and receiving calls. It utilizes Bluetooth technology to play your favorite tunes, and, thanks to its upgraded battery, lasts for up to a month on a single charge.
Normally retailing for $126 AUD, the XXL Shower Speaker is [$19 USD], saving you 80 percent off its normal price.
